name: bbPress – Admin Notes
author: Pippin Williamson

sections.description: This is a simple extension that allows forum admins and editors to leave notes on topic replies. If you run a support forum, or any other community forum, this is a great way for forum moderators to communicate privately between each other in relation to the replies.
sections.changelog:
1.2.3

  • Fixed an incorrect filter name
  • Better defensive coding

1.2.2

  • Fixed a fatal error taht occurred if bbPress wasn’t active

1.2.1

  • Fixed a conflict with the bbPress Support Topic plugin, props Chris Mavricos for report and fix

1.2

  • Fixed a bug with notes not showing on replies
  • Fixed a bug that allowed notes to show up in comment feeds and widgets

1.1

  • Added support for posting notes to topic’s lead replies

1.0.5

  • Send out an email to all subscribed forum moderators when a new admin note is added

1.0.4

  • Fixed an issue with permissions for forum moderators

1.0.3

  • Fixed a problem where reply authors (even non moderators) would get a “New Comment” email when posting a note

1.0.2

  • Hide the Add Note links from anyone who isn’t a moderator

1.0.1

  • Fixed an issue with retrieving the Reply ID

1.0

  • First release!
